dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @select:up.model_name:model_name@, @select:up.model_description:model_description@, @select:up.partition_name:partition_name@, @select:up.partition_description:partition_description@, @select:up.partition_code:partition_code@, @select:up.model_code:model_code@, @select:up.is_active:is_active@, @select:up.depth:depth@ FROM ( SELECT nls2.name model_name, nls2.description model_description, nls1.name partition_name, nls1.description partition_description, cpv.partition_code partition_code, cpv.model_code model_code, cpv.is_active is_active, cpv.depth depth FROM cmn_user_partitions_v cpv, cmn_captions_nls nls1, cmn_captions_nls nls2, cmn_partition_models cpm WHERE cpv.user_id = @where:param:user_id@ and cpv.model_code = cpm.code and ( (@where:param:user_def:string:model_code@ IS NOT NULL AND cpm.code = @where:param:user_def:string:model_code@) OR (@where:param:user_def:string:model_code@ IS NULL AND cpm.code= cpm.code)) and nls1.table_name = 'CMN_PARTITIONS' and nls1.pk_id = cpv.partition_id and nls1.language_code = @where:param:language@ and nls2.table_name = 'CMN_PARTITION_MODELS' and nls2.pk_id = cpm.id and nls2.language_code = @where:param:language@ and cpv.is_active = 1 union SELECT nls.name model_name, nls.description model_description, nls.name partition_name, nls.description partition_description, 'NIKU.ROOT' partition_code, 'NIKU.ROOT' model_code, 1 is_active, 1 depth FROM cmn_captions_nls nls WHERE nls.table_name = 'CMN_PARTITIONS' and nls.pk_id = -1 and nls.language_code = @where:param:language@ union SELECT nls2.name model_name, nls2.description model_description, nls1.name partition_name, nls1.description partition_description, cpv.partition_code partition_code, cpv.model_code model_code, cpv.is_active is_active, cpv.depth depth FROM cmn_user_partitions_v cpv, cmn_captions_nls nls1, cmn_captions_nls nls2, cmn_partition_models cpm WHERE cpv.model_code = cpm.code and ( (@where:param:user_def:string:model_code@ IS NOT NULL AND cpm.code = @where:param:user_def:string:model_code@) OR (@where:param:user_def:string:model_code@ IS NULL AND cpm.code= cpm.code)) and nls1.table_name = 'CMN_PARTITIONS' and nls1.pk_id = cpv.partition_id and nls1.language_code = @where:param:language@ and nls2.table_name = 'CMN_PARTITION_MODELS' and nls2.pk_id = cpm.id and nls2.language_code = @where:param:language@ and cpv.is_active = 1 ) up WHERE @FILTER@
SELECT @SELECT:RES.PRID:PRID@, @SELECT:RES.PRNAME:PRNAME@ FROM PRRESOURCE RES WHERE @FILTER@ AND RES.PRISROLE != 0

SELECT @SELECT:p.prid:resource_id@, @SELECT:r.last_name:last_name@ FROM srm_resources r, prj_resources p WHERE r.id = p.prid AND p.prisrole = 1 AND (@where:param:user_def:integer:resource_type@ is null or r.resource_type = @where:param:user_def:integer:resource_type@) AND @FILTER@
